betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§6Mekanism§r is a Machinery mod that adds plenty of blocks that help with loads of tasks, like §eproducing energy§r and §ecreating new materials from existing ones§r.

From the §6Electrolytic Seperator§r to the §6Osmium Compressor§r to the §6Metallurgic Infuser§r, you'll be sure to have a fun time making your base §einto a factory of mass production§r!

§eCollect an §6Osmium Ingot§e to begin this questline§r.

say VAR_NAME has unlocked the gate to Mekanism!
